snippet: The Arizona Diamondbacks agreed to a four-year, $40 million contract with infielder Martin Prado.
abstract: Arizona Diamondbacks sign infielder Martin Prado to a four-year, $40 million contract.
lead_paragraph: The Arizona Diamondbacks agreed to a four-year, $40 million contract with infielder Martin Prado.

headline.seo: Martin Prado and Arizona Agree on Contract
headline.main: Prado and Arizona Agree on Contract
headline.print_headline: Prado and Arizona Agree on Contract
